tasks.compile: mkdir -p dist && deno compile -A --output dist/epic main.ts
tasks.compile:darwin: mkdir -p dist && deno compile -A --target x86_64-apple-darwin --output dist/epic-x86_64-apple-darwin main.ts
tasks.compile:windows: mkdir -p dist && deno compile -A --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --output dist/epic-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc.exe main.ts
tasks.compile:linux: mkdir -p dist && deno compile -A --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --output dist/epic-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu main.ts
tasks.build: deno task compile:darwin && deno task compile:windows && deno task compile:linux && deno task package
